paper.title: Sample Path Generation of the Stochastic Volatility CGMY Process and Its Application to Path-Dependent Option Pricing
paper.abstract: This paper proposes the sample path generation method for the stochastic volatility version of the CGMY process. We present the Monte-Carlo method for European and American option pricing with the sample path generation and calibrate model parameters to the American style S&P 100 index options market, using the least square regression method. Moreover, we discuss path-dependent options, such as Asian and Barrier options.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是提出了一种用于随机波动率CGMY过程的样本路径生成方法，并将其应用于欧式和美式期权定价以及路径依赖型期权（如亚式和障碍期权）的定价。这些内容明确属于衍生品定价领域。
